text:
e="preserve">Ram Awadhesh Singh Yadav (June 18, 1937 – July 20, 2020) was an Indian politician. He was a member of the Lok Sabha from 1977 to 1979 and of the Rajya Sabha from 1986 to 1992. He was a well-known socialist leader.
Singh died on July 20, 2020 at a hospital in Patna, India, aged 83.
